entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
